title: 普通硬币mod掉落率修改
author: 暗黑荆轲
txt_content:
如题，这个mod加入了物品，但是要自行修改掉率
配置文件如下
能否更改好发给我？
# Configuration file

"coins type" {
    # Which coins use to drop from arcanebore? (0 - bronze, 1 - silver, 2 - gold, 3 - platinum)

main {
    # How many coins should be in a stack? (100 means that 1 silver coin = 100 bronze coins, 1 gold = 100 silver)
    I:coinsStackSize=100

    # Enable or disable coins drops from mobs
    B:drop=true
}


repairing {
    # Enable or disable repairing items by coins
    B:repair=true

    # Which coins use to repairing? (0 - bronze, 1 - silver, 2 - gold, 3 - platinum)
    I:repairCoinType=1

    # How much does the item repairing?
    I:repairCost=50
}
